logger.doc:name: LOG INFO Start of Flow
logger.message: Start of Student Interest sync flow

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/json import * from dw::core::Strings --- "SELECT AQB__ContactExternalID__c,Id,(SELECT Id FROM AQB__Education__r where AQB__IsPrimaryDegree__c = 'YES' ) FROM Contact WHERE AQB__ContactExternalID__c IN " ++ substringBeforeLast(("(" ++ (payload.EMPLID distinctBy ((item, index) -> item) reduce ((item, accumulator='') -> accumulator ++ '\'' ++ leftPad(item,9,'0') ++ '\'' ++ ',' ))),',') ++ ")"
%dw 2.0 output application/json import * from dw::core::Objects --- keySet(payload groupBy $.EMPLID)

ee:transform.doc:name: DW Create Student Interest Existance Check Query

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output text/plain --- "SELECT aqc_externalid__c FROM AQB__LLStudentInterestType__c Where Id IN (Select AQB__InterestType__c FROM AQB__StudentInterest__c WHERE AQB__EducationLink__c = " ++ "'" ++ vars.vStdInterestRequest.AQB__EducationLink__c[0] default null ++ "'" ++ ")"

salesforce:query.doc:name: Query Student Interest To Check If Interest Is Present

ee:transform.doc:name: DW convert response payload into Json

logger.doc:name: LOG INFO
logger.message: Student Interest Already Exits for EMPID

logger.doc:name: LOG INFO End of Flow
logger.message: End of Student Interest sync flow

ee:transform.doc:name: DW Create Student Interest Type Payload

logger.doc:name: LOG INFO End
logger.message: Student Interest Type Upsert Completed Successfully
